title: [Dead Plateau, River Chasm]
description: A torrent erupts from the face of the plateau several hundred feet below.  Clear, sparkling water pours out of a chasm and cascades to the low mountain range below, drifting off to the southeast as a silver ribbon.  Though the river appears to provide ample water, no trees dot the river's edge as far as the eye can see.  The chasm itself yawns before you a hundred feet wide, effectively blocking progress along the plateau's edge to the west.

A torrent erupts from the face of the plateau several hundred feet below. Though the river appears to provide ample water, no trees dot the river's edge as far as the eye can see.  The chasm itself yawns before you a hundred feet wide, effectively blocking progress along the plateau's edge to the west.
